spec_cardiology_desc: Comprehensive heart and vascular care including prevention, diagnosis, and treatment.
spec_dermatology_desc: Skin, hair, and nail expertise covering conditions, cosmetic care, and treatments.
spec_pediatrics_desc: Healthcare for infants, children, and adolescents, focusing on growth and preventive care.
notice_app: Download our MedConnect app for easier booking.
labs_intro: We provide a wide range of diagnostic and preventive lab tests to support your healthcare needs.
lab_blood_desc: Routine and specialized blood analysis for health monitoring.
lab_xray_desc: Imaging services for bones, chest, and internal diagnostics.
lab_covid_desc: Rapid and PCR testing for accurate COVID-19 detection.
labs_notice2: Fasting required for certain blood tests.
labs_notice3: Results available online via the Patient Portal.
pharmacy_intro: Our in-house pharmacy provides fast access to prescribed medications and essential health products.
pharmacy_meds_desc: Pick up your prescribed treatments conveniently on-site.
pharmacy_otc_desc: Wide range of OTC medicines, vitamins, and supplements.
pharmacy_wellness_desc: Health products, skincare, and daily essentials.
pharmacy_notice1: Pharmacy open daily from 8:00 AM – 8:00 PM.
pharmacy_notice2: Bring a valid prescription for restricted medications.
pharmacy_notice3: Home delivery service available for select items.
portal_intro: Access your health records, appointments, and prescriptions securely.
about_intro: MedConnect is a modern healthcare platform designed to simplify hospital management, connect patients and doctors, and make healthcare more accessible.
about_mission: To provide seamless, secure, and efficient healthcare solutions that empower both patients and providers.
about_vision: To become a leading digital healthcare platform in the region, connecting people to quality care anytime, anywhere.
about_value2: Transparency and trust in every service.
about_value4: Respect and inclusivity for all communities.
contact_intro: Please enter your details and we'll get back to you.
notices_intro: Stay up to date with the latest announcements, health tips, and important updates from MedConnect.
notice1_desc: Flu shots are available this week. Book your appointment now.
notice2_desc: Our lab will remain open on Saturday from 8:00 AM to 12:00 PM.
notice3_desc: Download our mobile app for easier booking and faster results access.
privacy_intro: We value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data.
privacy_data_text: We collect personal information such as your name, email, phone number, and medical details when you use our services.
privacy_usage_text: Your information is used to book appointments, provide healthcare services, and improve our platform.
privacy_security_text: We implement strict measures to ensure your data is stored securely and accessed only by authorized personnel.
terms_page_intro: By using MedConnect, you agree to the following terms and conditions.
terms_page_section1_text: MedConnect provides healthcare management tools for patients and providers. You agree to use these services responsibly and in accordance with applicable laws.
terms_page_section2_text: You are responsible for providing accurate personal information and keeping your login credentials secure.
terms_page_section3_text: MedConnect is not liable for any medical outcomes. Services are provided as a platform to connect patients with healthcare providers.
confirm_msg: Please review your details before confirming:
rq_file_types: Accepted file types: pdf, jpg, jpeg, png.
rq_categories_required: Select at least one service category.
portal_forgot_success: Your request has been received. We will contact you soon.
appt_forbidden: You are not allowed to create an appointment with this account.
appt_time_unavailable: Selected time is no longer available. Please choose another slot.
appt_unexpected_response: Appointment booked, but response was unexpected.
appt_doctor_unavailable_day: Doctor is not available on this day.
dashboard_load_error: We could not load your dashboard. Please log in again.
dashboard_intro_doctor: Your schedule and patient actions are ready.
dashboard_intro_admin: System oversight and management tools are available.
dashboard_intro_patient: Your upcoming appointments and reports are ready.
doc_profile_cta_body: Schedule an appointment with this doctor in minutes.
doc_profile_not_found_body: We couldn't find this doctor profile. Please return to the doctors page.
